::Rodimus Prime::

Rodimus dodged Scavanger's 15 shells, easily in vehical mode. Only to
have Pyro's three fire balls blast in to his side.
"Yikes! HOT! HOT! HOT!" He yells. He drives in a way to try and hit
Pyro, with his Wenabago trailer.
